values:
LJ Interests meme results

  1. books:
    Err, yeh read em, can be loads of fun, as long as yeh dont go Kafka too early.
  2. cartoons:
    Aye, they're fun, and kids have a tendency to dig em.
  3. clouds shaped as rubberducks:
    Lol, this is not true actually, well, i havent seen one, that is. Bob Marley has a song that goes; "In a rub-n-dub style", ya? and the whole house was convince he said; "In a rubberduck sky", so. Ya.
  4. curiosity:
    Curiosity is a nice thing, espesially when it comes to girls trying to find out if they're gay or not:D
  5. fairies:
    Aye, tiny creatures with wings. They can fly. Like Peter Pan.
  6. handwritten words on paper:
    Ya, tis nice to look at. And I like to write on paper, yesh I do.
  7. magic:
    How does one explain magic? I like it anyway.
  8. mummidalen:
    Lovely cartoon made by the most talented woman in Finland. Tis gorgeous.
  9. psychology:
    Yes, we like to analyze people.
  10. rollerblades:
    Weee:D Tis faster than walking at least.

Enter your LJ user name, and 10 interests will be selected from your interest list.

I bought a yellow scarf today:D For 25 kroners, wonderful. Its pretty, and snuggly, and I think I might have a crush on it. o.O 
Anywho, today I will go get the camera from the local newspaper, and start shooting my video-diary. Why did I sign up for this? A stupid thing to do seeing as I really have no desire of showing my morning-face to everyone in Bergen. And I wonder how my old aunt Kjellaug is going to react if she sees the show... I haven told her I'm gay yet. *Cough*
Think that I might have screwed up big time here. 
Ah, sod it, it'll only last for like five minutes or so, how much morning-sleepy-face and gayness can they squeeze in?

Risk:
12% NUCLEAR
66% BIOLOGICAL
27% CONVENTIONAL
Your above scores indicate your relative risk in each of the 3 main types of terrorism. A score above 50% means you are living with the real possibility of death by that type of terrorism. A score above 75% represents extreme danger. Below 25% means you are most likely safe.



Some quick advice follows:

TO REDUCE CHANCE OF NUCLEAR ATTACK
- Avoid large cities (especially political or financial centers) at all costs
- Avoid extremely large sporting events
- Avoid suburbs of extreme large cities

TO REDUCE CONVENTIONAL DEATH ODDS:
- Avoid buses and subways
- Avoid suspicious people
- Avoid establishments owned by targeted groups
- Avoid exploding bombs

TO REDUCE BIO RISK:
- Avoid contact with other people
- Own a shack in the woods - or a cool boat
- Avoid contact with lots of mail (think: Anthrax)
- Avoid drinking tap water

This test sponsored by Dasani.



My test tracked 3 variables How you compared to other people your age and gender:
You scored higher than 3% on nuclear
 You scored higher than 74% on biological
 You scored higher than 26% on conventional

I'm moving, I'm moving, I'm moving:D 

Hey, guess what! I'm effin bloody donkey's arse MOVING. Yesssss, fer fooks sake!
I neeeeeed to moooooove! God damnit! I swear, the busses on this bloody island are non-existent, hmph!
This is how drunk we were in Prague. God I love that city:D

Since Friday I've had one bowl of noodles, one piece of toast, some french-fries and enough coffee to last at least a year. I've had about two hours of sleep every night, and I've walked probably 2/3 of every day. Exhausted! I'm a real couch-potato ffs, I'm not built for this!

In the city where I live it rains 265 days pr year. That's two out of three days. 

In one year 400 000 olympic swimming-pools of water drops onto this city. 

A normal house roof gets 18 tons of rain every month, and 225 tons pr year.
 
If you stand under a waterfall for 16 years you still wouldn't have gotten more water on you than Bergen does in 1.

So far the record is 86 days of continuous downpour. (Now, that's just mental)

It never ends! I live in this fucking place and I don't even own an umbrella, it's just sick

Oweee! One and a half week left till schools over, aaaaand, I just found out that I'm getting 180 kroners pr day + child-support-thingy from my dad all through the summer:D
It's just fantastic, I'm getting payed for doing nothing, god I love this country.
It shoots soap-bubbles!

Life has this creepy effect on me sometimes. I seem to find myself disliking a lot of things it offers me, yet I cannot refuse to accept them. I've tried to just say no, I really have. Once I even tried to use a rather rude tone when I declined one of the most horrific offers, but it seems I am not allowed voice my opinion without getting several stabs in the back. Am I being selfish or is this just not fair? I mean, I cannot recall being mean to life, so why is it allowed to be so horrible to me without even getting punished for it? When I was younger I got sent to my room if I wasn't behaving properly, and so were my sisters, but life never got sent anywhere. I don't think that's a fair deal, do you? But then again, does life ever get a treat? I'm not sure about that, I'll have to ask next time it offers me something. If it doesn't get any treats then I think we're about even, but I still would prefer if it got some snack-packs instead of getting away with everything. I don't get -that- many treats. Maybe if I share mine? I wouldn't mind, seriously! It could have some!

Your fairy is called Tangle Goblinfrost 
 
 She is a bringer of riches and wealth
 
 She lives at the bottom of tangled gardens and in hedgerows 
 
 She is only seen during the first snow of winter 
 


I'm a fairy:D

Our house has four bedrooms, two living-rooms, one bathroom, one and a half kitchen, three hallways and we have a apartment in the cellar where my mum lives. As of today these are the people who live in this not too big house of ours; 
Me
My sister Beate and her husband Arunas (they actually own this madhouse)
Their kids, Leon and Legolas
My other sister Elizabeth and her two kids Svein Erik and Alida
A Lithuanian guy called Josses or something like that
My mum in the cellar
And then we have my uncle in the caravan in the garden.

This puts us to a total of 9 people on the top floor, 1 in the cellar and 1 in the garden...!
I'm getting claustrophobic, I swear.

So, I've made a Quiz about Norway, it's questionable I must admit. Dont think even the Norwegians will make it, well, actually I know the Norwegians wont make it, but whatever...!

<lj-cut text="The Questionable Quiz"> 


1)  Did all Norwegians go to South Africa last year? 

a) No, we went to Tanzania 
b) Yes, but we never returned and are currently somwhere in Egypt 
c) No, we all went camping on the boarder of Sweeden 
d) South Africa? Is that in America somewhere? 
e) Wouldn't we melt in the sun if we did? Not a wise move... 



2)  Is Norway currently in war with the Russian mafia? 

a) Yes, we stopped them from importing too warm furs, they got pissed 
b) Yes, but no one knows it yet, not even the Russians, and they know alot (especially about vodka) 
c) No, but we really want to have a big snowball fight 
d) Norway wanted a war but Russia refused to waste any of their bombs.They are still waiting for the US  
e) Did the last one offend anyone? It shouldn't have, seeing as we all know it's true...! 



3)  Has Norway ever been attached to Japan? 

a) No, but on the 5th of August we are getting attached to one another 
b) Yes, and then Japan kicked us out after the snowball fight with the Russians 
c) Not all of Japan, just the little part of it thats floating pointlessly around in the Atlantic Sea 
d) No,but Norway has asked permission to build a New-Norway on Japan,we are hoping that Holland will build one too
e) Answer C is correct. Ffs! Did I just say that?! 



4)  Did Norway have sex with Bill Clinton on a pool table? 

a) No, we did not have sexual relations with that man 
b) Yes, but only after he and Lewinsky had cleaned off what they left behind 
c) We don't know yet, it's under investigation 
d) Well, yes, but at least we didn't do the cigar thing 
e) Who cares? We're gonna lie about it anyway 



5)  Who was voted "The best actor in 2005" by the Norwegians? 

a) Bill Clinton 
b) George W. Bush 
c) Frank Sinatra (Don't ask me why, cause I would only tell you lies in respond anyway) 
d) The pope (we all know he was waaaay over 200 years old, that lying son of a b****)

God, I'm so bloody sick of bus-drivers! They're always yelling at me! I can't put one foot into the bus without the driver telling me to "stop that", or "take those off" (rollerblades), or "Don't shove the card in so hard, the machine might break...!", I mean, what the fuck? Is it me? Have I done something to offend bus-drivers worldwide? I even like to take the bus! I must be the only person on this godforsaken earth who actually enjoys to sit on a bus. They should love me, not tell me to sod off all the time! Bloody wankers...

My mum accused me of planting weed in the woods...! I mean, ok, it's not normal for me to be running around in the woods all day, but still, planting weed? Not only is it a stupid idea to be planting anything in the neighbor's forest, it's also the issue of Norway being way too cold for such plants to survive outdoors. You can't just accuse your kid of planting weed in the forest anyway, it's not normal for fucks sake. God...!

Well, my baby said she's feeling bad today
Said her thoughts were dark
Had visions of someone else
Said she belonged not to me

Well, my baby said my eyes turned grey today
Said she liked them better blue
But as the rain soaked us to the bone
She revealed all her secrets to me

She whispers
Her body twist and her toes curl up
She gives a little shiver
And by the time she moans we both know that my baby will from now on always belong to me

Well, my baby hit me like cocaine today
She raised her hands up 
And melted away in joy
Now she belongs to me again

Nature, beautiful places, oceans, birds, the sky, stars that shine, night and day, sun and moon, light and day.

To capture the smell of flowers and trees, to see clouds change color as the sun sets, to watch birds float in thin air.

Everything that can be sensed, lived and felt paints your soul full of pictures you'll always have. A treasure of the most precious.

SHUT IT! FER FOOKS SAKE, YEH NEED TO SHUT THE FOOK UP! Tis drivin me mental, look at me; I'm insane! Mission accomplished, now; Shut yer fookin mouth! 
I swear; Women do mi head in. Nag, nag, nag, all day, every day, NAG!
Hmph!

So, yesterday I decided to write a page full of only happy thoughts. (Well, it's not yesterday yet seeing as I'm writing this today). (No, that didn't make sense... I wrote this yesterday (today) but I'm writing it right now, only "right now" is actually yesterday). (Ah, fuck it, you know what I mean, yeah?).
(Well, you probably don't but just forget about it, it's not the point).
Uhm, yeah... What was I saying?
Oh yeah, happy page full of thoughts! 
No, happy thoughts on a full page. Crap! Just read the top, ok?
Anywhooo... Yesterday (or today that is) (oh god, don't get in to this again!) was a brilliant day. Warm, sunny and rather joyful as I finally got around to taking my pills. *cough* That sounded bad. It's not though, medicine is good for those who need it. 
Erm, right, not really helping, am I? (Just try to not pay to much attention to the pill thing, that's not the point either, this is about yesterday (today) being a splendid day.)
Well, actually I was just going to write down some happy thoughts, but it seems I have forgotten about that. I can't find a way to jump back to writing happy thoughts instead of what I'm writing now, so I guess I'll just have to stick to this.
Right... So... What I'm writing now doesn't really have a topic does it? Well of course it's the "splendid day" thing, but that's just a wee bit too boring to rant on about. 
Hmm, tis quite hard to write about something that has no topic, cause then there ain't nothing to write about.
You know what? This is just stupid, I'm writing about nothing instead of cleaning my room like I should be doing. My god, I just wasted a whole ten minutes and a perfectly fine piece of paper on nothing. And on top of that it made me confused and stressed. Hmph... If this ruins my splendid day (yesterday) I'm going to eat a lollipop to cheer me up. (Forget that, I've already started on the lolly.)
Well, anywhoo, Ima stop now.

Spliff, spliff, spliffety, spliff.
High, high, highety, high.
Nervous, nervous, nervousity, nervous.
Fucked, fucked, fuckety, fucked.





Pop a pill.

My friend wanted a "break"...! Friends don't have "breaks" for fucks sake! 
The world must have lost it's mind and gone mental, cause this just aint right! Oh lord, how idiotic...

Tis funny, I is a wee sod, I is scared o tractors n tall buildings, I'm not very handy n not very strong, tis funny dat I is a natural talent at operatin excavators. I is scared o dem too actually but dem bloody fun to play wi(Oi mimle, before yeh comment; aye, I admit it. I is a real tractor-dyke).  
Mebbe dis is me mission in life, I is supposed to be diggin...! Strange mission but still quite wicked.

Yea, I kno, I is childish, fi tru. Tis too much babylon power rulin. Too much politics n selfish people in the world. Most people dunt even smile no more, so blessed be the soul dat always remain a child.

Ah, yeh tink me a fool? Well, yeh kno, there is such a ting called educated fools as well. Dem the ones dat tek pride in their ability to understand electrisity insted o just respectin it's amazin powers. 
I kno what's important in life, dats why I tek more pride in mekin people laff dan I do in me ability to understand the english language. 

Aye, me mebbe a bad example fer dem youngsters, but not all examples are to be followed, n yeh still need us bad ones to recognize the good ones. I might not be perfect, n aye, I might light a spill sumtimes fi tru, but I is a simple person n it's in me nature to be peaceful, so in all I is still no poor excuse fer a human, still no raga muffin. 

Seen? 


Seen...

Last night I had 257 thoughts in my head

They passed by in a blur 

Had my mind been a tad bit more fragile, I could have died there and then.

Once upon a time, in a rather small village, there lived a wee lass who constantly dreamed o fairies. Now, dis little lass was raised by mad hounds, n when I say "mad" I mean "fookin scary evil beast wif rotten teeth".
(Wait a sec, I'm sick o callin her "wee lass" all the time. Her name was Fairy Mary Twisted Twat, but I fink I'll just go fer Fairy Twat.)
So... Where was I? Oh yes... She was raised by... No, fook, I've said dat. Gimme a sec...
Shite, how bloody stoopid.
Ya, anywhooo...
In dis village, yeah? Mad hounds weren't allowed. By dat I mean; if yeh was a hound (n a mad one even) yeh was not worthy o conversations n such wif the otha inhabitants o the village. So obviously dis was a problem fer Fairy Twat. She was no hound, but was considered to be one by the village folks. Yes, it was all quite irritatin, especially when she grew older n proved herself much smarter dan dem idiot children o deirs. Dem fookers! I've neva in mi lifetime met ne1 as stoopid as... No, wait, got carried away there, forget wot I said. Where was I? Yes... Idiot kids.
Aye, now, Fairy Twat didn't care much fer the hounds, I mean, she didn't really have a problem wif em, she just didn't like em very much. Well, the hounds didn't seem to like Fairy Twat very much either, so it was, in a weird way, a win-win situation. 

Did I mention dat dis story has no endin n is in all quite useless? Well, it is, n it has no meanin either, cause it ain't personal. Fairy Twat ain't meh, n the hounds ain't mi family, s all just rubbish on paper. Dis was written in ten minutes at mi favorite cafe. I was bored n was drawin a fairy on a library book, hence - Fairy Mary Twisted Twat. I looked out the window n saw a fookin big evil lookin dog; mad hounds.
Writin turns yer hours back to minutes. Dey ain't gifted or mysterious; dey bored.
Ask me no questions, and I shall tell you no lies.

I was downloading this song, yeah? Kinnie Starr with Sun again. So, dl complete, (Yay! Nice song!)my sister came in and light her ciggie, asked me to play her the song I downloaded, yeah? I was listening to this reggae shite, so I said I was busy and that I'd play it for her later. But then she started saying that I was such a perv cause it was obvious that I was downloading porn...! I was like; "Yeh idiot! Choo say dat fer? Like I need the internet to get meh worked up!"  
So, to prove her wrong I turned on the song... Out of nothing this sex scene from The L word fills up the screen. My sister is like; "wot tha...?!" I'm like; "No,no,no,no, dis ain't no MP3!"
So, my sister runs downstairs laughing like mental, and then (just to make my face go even redder) my mum walks in! I'm going; "Shite, shite,shite!" "Noooo, it's not...I was just...I thought it was...", but then (get this) she just covers her eyes with her hand and say something about not meaning to disturb, and then backs out of the room! 
This is NOT a good day!

They're gone!
Fuck 'em!
Let 'em stroll around mars, venus and jupiter.
So far away,
you know they're gonna regret it one day.
They're gone!
So, fuck 'em!
We'll manage. You'll be the sun, and I the water.
Did you surrender your courage to 'em?
Did you trade your sanity for an hour of joy?
No. So fuck 'em!
Come, sit, have an ice-cream.

Let the sun shine
Let you shine

Like lightning in a peaceful mind
And cursing in a respected church
Words of bliss on depressed lips
Greener grass on your side of the fence 

Let stars fall
Let you fall

Like worries in a carefree soul
And love in a hateful mind
Hopeful dreams in the realistic's thoughts
Blood on the innocent's hands

Let me be
And I will let you be as well

In times of old, when we were new
And life had barely started
I always felt down and gloom 
Whenever we were parted

And even though times have changed
And technology has grow beyond measure
In my heart you'll always be
My love, my life and my greatest treasure

I know I've acted like a bloody fool
And I know you must feel deceived
But I want to tell you that from you, my love
All good things I have received

*Sheds thousands of tears*
These will probably be the most understandable words I'll ever write.

The Unspeakable

To speak of such makes me nothing but a fool. 
Thou should not speak of the unspeakable.
Yet, if the unspeakable does not remain unspoken, who would have the nerve to cast such a filthy name upon me when all I did was to speak of something that once was unspoken?
Like speaking the unspeakable thou should not rename someone based on grounds of speaking ability.
This is why I want to move to backwardsworld, where the unspoken already has been spoken of.
I can not speak the unspeakable in this world, nor can I in backwardsworld. 
Therefor no one can cast me a filthy name based on grounds other than wasting a fine piece of paper.
